AboutDesignFutureGateway APIs

The FutureGateway Framework has been initialy developed in the context of the European project INDIGO-dc, further refined in the context of the European project EOSC-hub and finally maintained in best effort basis by the INFN Dept. of Catania.

FutureGateway Framework is a complete framework to build Science Gateways This web site keeps updated information about this software initiative
